block.p: Ritu Mukerji, the daughter of Dr. Swati Mukerji and Aditya B. Mukerji of Piedmont, Calif., was married yesterday to Dr. Alex Samuel Metzger, a son of Linda S. Metzger and Dr. Carl D. Metzger of Cape Elizabeth, Me. The Rev. Stephen D. Thrush performed the nondenominational ceremony at the Andretti Winery in Napa, Calif. A traditional Hindu blessing ceremony was performed last July at the Oberoi Grand Hotel in Calcutta.

Mrs. Metzger, 27, is a medical student at Jefferson Medical College in Philadelphia. Dr. Metzger, 28, received an M.D. degree earlier this month from Jefferson Medical College and has begun a residency in internal medicine at Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. The bride and bridegroom graduated from Columbia.
